snippet.title: The Knightling - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
🛡️ Take up your shield and become the hero the realm needs in The Knightling, a fantasy action-adventure game, coming to Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.💫

✨Wishlist now!✨
https://www.theknightling.com/


Developed by Twirlbound, published by Saber Interactive.


=====[FOLLOW The Knightling]=====
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/betheknightling
X: https://x.com/betheknightling
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/eEKBmSXudk
